website_summaries.verdict: A worthwhile investment for consumers who want a tasty, effective way to get B12 by a trusted name in high-quality vitamins since 1977.
pros: Delivers 5,000 mcg of easy-to-absorb methylcobalamin B12 in pleasant-tasting cherry flavored lozenges that can be chewed or dissolved
Many users rave about having more energy after taking them
cons: May not be ideal for consumers that prefer to swallow supplements, as the lozenges are somewhat large
Pricey, especially considering you only get 60 lozenges per bottle

customer_reviews.title: Not your standard, cheap B12
customer_reviews.text: I can tell the difference between regular B12 and methyl B12. Until recently, I’d been using regular B12 and couldn’t understand how other people said it gave them energy and made them feel better. It did nothing for me. Then I did some research and read that methyl B12 was different because it was already broken down and useable immediately. I decided to order this and try it. After 5 days of use, I actually can tell a difference. I’m not ready to run any marathons, but I definitely have more energy and better focus than before. I will definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: I Love Labs

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: This chewable took my Vitamin B12 levels from dangerously low to so high I can only take them every other day. I have a problem with absorbing supplements, but this was not an issue here. I read somewhere that methyl B12 is easier to absorb, and it's worked for me. The flavor is decent and takes two seconds to chew up. Totally worth it. I've always been an energetic person, but with the help of this supplement, along with vitamin D and iron, I stopped drinking my usual 2 cups a day of coffee and switched to one cup of decaf! I have even more energy than before.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Braga

customer_reviews.title: Good product however let me stress this
customer_reviews.text: Good product however let me stress this! I had low B12 due to digestive issues. This helped greatly in getting my levels into the normal range and was quite energized; HOWEVER once your levels are in range or "topped off" the benefits will deminish. Once your in range its probably best to back off too a maintenance dose. Otherwise the excess is just pee'd away.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Smith

customer_reviews.title: Results
customer_reviews.text: Age 72. Energy completely zapped after radiation treatment for cancer. Ordered this product. Took 1 tablet under tongue once a day and experienced heart palpitations at night. I reduced to 1/4 tab with great results and after a month increased to 1/2 tablet. Has greatly increased my energy and ability to stay awake for an entire day!!
customer_reviews.author: Judith M. Marzullo

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for me as far as energy, but the quality of the product is very inconsistent. Some batches are perfect and easy to dissolve. Other batches are hard as a rock. I stopped buying these for that reason and opted for a different brand, which turned out to be more consistent in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One stop shop with Jarrow B-12
customer_reviews.text: I love and continue to use these chewable B-12 supplements for a few reasons. One - I trust the Jarrow brand. Two - the chewable tablets (cherry flavor) taste great and have been a part of my morning regimen for around 6 months now. Lastly, as someone with Grave’s disease, B-12 is essential to help maintain my thyroid levels. I haven’t taken my anti-thyroid medication in 2 months and to my own surprise am doing just fine. Along with a healthy diet, exercise, rest, and of course these yummy chews - I am feeling A-okay! Thanks Jarrow!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Lynch

customer_reviews.title: it's great, and there's proof!
customer_reviews.text: This works great, and I had the blood test done to prove it! When I was feeling fatigued all the time I had multiple blood tests done, one of which for B12. It came back at a relatively low number. Two and half months after starting Jarrow's Methyl B12 I had it retested and it had more than doubled. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Using this product resulted in the worst breakout I have ever experienced.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to help restore B12 levels after discovering that I was suffering from anemia. After taking the product for a week I felt great! About two weeks in I started noticing pimples popping up here and there but nothing extreme so I didn't give it a second thought. By week three my face, neck, and chest were covered in an extremely painful breakout. I stopped taking the B12 immediately, and after two weeks the acne has still not cleared. My face is so inflamed that a coworker asked if I had gone for a chemical peel. Prior to this I had naturally clear skin. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Polox_ses

customer_reviews.title: Not certain that this product really is what it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Not certain that this product really is what it is labeled as... I have purchased Jarrow B12 products from a local health food store on numerous occasions. However this order-product arrived and I could immediately see a difference in the pill color (very light pinkish-white color). I plan to return this item and go my regular route of purchase for Jarrow B12 product ... which is through the health food store
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: and lack of sleep makes it worse. After a period of using these lozengers
customer_reviews.text: This Jarrow product has helped me in so many ways, for many years. Stress can do damage to your memory, and lack of sleep makes it worse. After a period of using these lozengers, my memory improved, finally some clarity. I sleep better now. My mind is clear. Use an hour or 2 before bedtime. Give it 60 days, my life is better. My memory improved. Just give it a try
customer_reviews.author: Clare A Stillwagon

customer_reviews.title: A bit research led me to this choice
customer_reviews.text: Jarrow Formulas is a trusted brand in our home. Priced affordably, chewable, lightly flavored are distinct pluses. Be mindful that the "other" form of B-12 (Cyanocobalamin) is not easily assimilated by our bodies, contains trace amounts of cyanide while not dangerous still requires the body to expand a higher level of energy to metabolize it to remove it from our system. It's also synthetic and therefore cheap to manufacture. Jarrow Formulas which uses Methylcobalamin which has been proven to provide the most active source of B-12 to us. If you're plagued by nerve pains, depression, anxiety or fatigue, add this important supplement to your daily regimen to help restore balance.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Caused my B12 levels to drop
customer_reviews.text: This product actually caused my B12 levels to drop... DRAMATICALLY. It also caused some kidney issues, and serious fluid retention. I switched to a Hydrox-Adeno B12 and I am feeling so much better. I have MTHFR and the Methylfolate and B12 both caused my folate and B12 levels to quickly drop.... I was so sick. Makes me wonder where some of these 'Doctors' are getting their info.
customer_reviews.author: Kreative

customer_reviews.title: First Supplement That Might Be Working
customer_reviews.text: I think this may be actually be helping. I'm certainly not pain free but I have noticed an improvement. I'm also taking cyanocobalamin but noticed no decrease in the "walking on very hot sand" (feet on FIRE) syndrome until I started the Methyl B-12 about three weeks later. My brain is doing OK too.
customer_reviews.author: Newman

customer_reviews.title: Bottle was already opened
customer_reviews.text: The color of the tabs are not the same and it came already open. I don’t feel comfortable taking it. This is not the same what ordered before. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Zach Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I then remembered that B12 is a big vitamin and is not absorbed easily --or at all
customer_reviews.text: Today I swallowed one of these whole. Nothing happened. I then remembered that B12 is a big vitamin and is not absorbed easily --or at all! I took another, but chewed it this time. Voila! In about an hour I found myself cleaning mirrors and glass -- and I have lots of both. I can only attribute this burst of energy to the B 12. Thanks, Jarrow.
customer_reviews.author: mzzbee

customer_reviews.title: Broke out like a teenage boy
customer_reviews.text: Broke out like a teenage boy. I've never had this much acne. I guess 83,330% is a bit excessive for my bodies needs.
customer_reviews.author: KIRK D

customer_reviews.title: Methyl-B12, works quickly
customer_reviews.text: My doctor prescribed me B12. After some tests showing a difficiency and MTFHR gene (meaning my body can't process non-active B12 well), I was told I needed methylated B12. This stuff worked quickly. And it's significantly cheaper than what they sell at the doctor's office. I noticed a lift in energy within a day or two of having taken it. This 5,000 mcg is nice because it tastes better than some other brands and fits nicely into my pillbox with the other 5 vitamins I'm taking daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Jarrow Methylcobalamin
customer_reviews.text: Very good results .. really make your brain super active,help to memorize thigs .. feeling less fatigue whole day... only issue is do not use is regular as it make your mind super active having issue to sleep properly
customer_reviews.author: Touseef

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely buy these
customer_reviews.text: I love these, I work 2 jobs (about 60-70 hours a week) and used to feel extremely drained during my day job sitting at a desk in a cubicle. I take one pill in the morning when I get to work and one right after lunch, no more accidental dozing, and I have a lot more energy during my night job. I recommend these to literally everyone. If you feel drained at all during the day, or need just a boost of energy from lack of sleep, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great mood and energy boost. The only vitamin/supplements I take every day
customer_reviews.text: I have never felt better! I am recommending this b12 to everyone. A great energy and mood boost. I have been struggling with some health and anxiety issues after a vegan diet for 8 years - I am assuming a b12 deficiency might be a cause to some of these issues and I am so so so grateful I found these on Amazon. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Daniela D.

customer_reviews.title: Brought my B12 levels up, tastes great too!
customer_reviews.text: This review is coming from someone that has been vitamin deficient for quite some time due to stomach and digestive issues. I have been B12, Iron and Vitamin D deficient for years. This B12 supplement actually took me back to stable so I couldn't be more pleased. I have been taking one per day first thing in the morning for a year now. These little gems are dissolved under the tongue and the tropical flavor is super tasty. I usually take mine first thing in the morning after brushing my teeth and before going into the shower. They do take quite some time to dissolve under the tongue but it's worth it if it works!
customer_reviews.author: JSV

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this per my endocrinologists orders. Took it for a few weeks so probably not enough time to notice a big difference. I ended up having to chew it because the lozenge would take FOREVER to dissolve. Then it would get stuck in my teeth. So I’m not sure how much b12 I was actually absorbing. This is SO sweet. Too sweet for me. It contains xylitol and I experience gastric distress if I consume any sugar alcohols, so I had to stop taking it. That was my mistake though as I didn’t read the label before ordering. Oops!
customer_reviews.author: Cheekybugger2017

customer_reviews.title: Headaches and vertigo episodes alert
customer_reviews.text: I started taking it on Monday and by friday, I got a migraine that I still can't get rid off and already had 3 episodes of major vertigo and ongoing dizziness. This supplement is the only change in my lifestyle and I just looked at the negative reviews and it looks like I am not the only one. I am stoping taking then immediately. These are dangerous. I am lucky that when I got hit with episodes of vertigo, I was always in a safe place like sitting on my couch or at my desk at work, and not driving or something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this to treat mild neuropathy (tingling in my toes). Does a great job. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: soil doc

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin B12 is crucial for brain health
customer_reviews.text: I am taking part in a huge medical study. During the process many tests were given to me. I am a healthcare professional and was stunned to find that my B12 levels were "practically non-existent". Yes, I began immediately with injections daily (self administered), but, after a period of time, I switched to this brand as recommended. My levels are appropriate and steady (well-absorbed). Both my husband and I take daily. Thank you for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these! I don’t eat meat
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I don’t eat meat, and only eat fish occasionally, but I always have great B12 levels when my blood is drawn. I worked in supplemental sales for a few years and always steered people towards Jarrow products and have a well practiced spiel about methy vs. cyano cobalamin. After going from low b-levels to the higher end of WNL, I believe my own sales pitch.
customer_reviews.author: SpeaksForTrees

customer_reviews.title: B12, the most important vitamin!  Personal favorite!💜
customer_reviews.text: This is the only Methyl B12 you should purchase. Being an holistic practitioner, I recommend this product. As it is absorbs as intended to be. Every person on this planet should be taking B12. Increases energy as well enriches your blood cells and so much more. I purchased 2 bottles, one for the kitchen (for reminder) and one for my car. When energy leaves at the end of the day when out and about, I have my B12 handy. I usually take 3 loungers a day. Happy Healing❣️
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Beware of headaches
customer_reviews.text: Works well, pleasant tasting. However the first time I took one I got a massive splitting headache for about 24 hours. 5000MG is a MASSIVE dose of B12. I recommend chopping them in half or in quarters, which is how I take them now, at least until you know how your body will react.
customer_reviews.author: Severian

customer_reviews.title: The Worst
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst sublingual b12 tabs I've ever tried. Very large. Sharp edges. Chalky. Slow to dissolve. The last half needs to be chewed to be done. After 1/2 hours of abrasive abuse to the underside of your tongue you just give up and chew the rest. No significant savings to justify having to endure this terrible product. I've probably use a half dozen different B12 sublinguals in the last few years. Some are better than others, but these are by far the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer  yes

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: As a MTHFR 2 Gene mutation patient I can attest this product really works. I have less fibromyalgia pain, am more active and my vision got better.
customer_reviews.author: sherri zollee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every day and I have noticed I get less headaches and my overall energy has improved. I like this product so much that I've bought 3 refills. Great price and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Angelle

customer_reviews.title: Energy !!
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday without food. No bad side effects like other vitamins that make you sick without eating, so they are great if you are like me in a hurry all the time. I take these with Folate vitamins and the energy has changed my life. I don't get as tired during a workout or a long days work with a 6 month old. The taste is great and you don't have to take with water they dissolve in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Laura York

customer_reviews.title: Xylitol, not good for...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to learn this is sweetened with Xylitol, which has been found to increase oxalate formation, which is what leads to kidney stones and in some, joint and muscle pain. Most of the other B12 supps are sweetened with cherry juice and/or mannitol.
customer_reviews.author: Douglass Dumbrille

customer_reviews.title: Methyl Blah Blah
customer_reviews.text: Mr Doctor told me to take B12. Recently I read that there were two kinds. The brand I'd bought at the drugstore had an ingredient beginning with C. This one's name begins with M. The article said the M brands were better than the C brands so I got this. I don't know if it's really better but I'm taking it now. You'll need to decide for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not qreat product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help me combat fatigue. I started taking a few days ago and everytime I take it, I get very sleepy. I am having trouble keeping my eyes open 8at my desk. It feels more like melatonin$$$?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There is no jitters or heart racing it just feels like i naturally just am not as tired
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find something to give me a little more energy throughout the day. I was sleeping ALL the time. I was literally taking a nap on a daily basis. I have had these for a little over a week and I havent taken a single nap since. There is no jitters or heart racing it just feels like i naturally just am not as tired. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda LaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Please only take if you know you’re deficient!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of all of the great reviews and I figured that with that high amount of b12, I would just pee out the excess! Wrong! As soon as I began taking it, I started getting vertigo that wouldn’t go away. In addition to that, my vision began changing, I got migraines, and felt so lightheaded I could hardly stand. I had my doctor check my b12 levels and it was off the chart high(>2,000). So, I’ve begun taking activated charcoal and am working on flushing it out of my system and am starting to feel better.
customer_reviews.author: K L

customer_reviews.title: LABEL IS WRONG IN ADVERTISEMENT
customer_reviews.text: ABOVE IS ACTUAL LABEL OF B12 I RECEIVED IN PICTURES 1, 2, & 3 >>>PICTURES 4 & 5 ARE THEIR ADVERTISED LABEL
customer_reviews.author: enola

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Better
customer_reviews.text: My neurologist suggested I take the B12-M because it supports the brain functions better than the regular B12. After 1 week I am noticing such an improvement in my energy and even feel like it is helping with mental clarity & motivation. I will definitely be keeping this supplement in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I usually don't take tablets. There's a debate if ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't take tablets. There's a debate if tablets dissolve in the stomach. But the B12 (methylcobalamin) provides me with energy and alertness. I purchased the 1000 mcg so I can take different amounts depending on the day.
customer_reviews.author: free2bmoe

customer_reviews.title: Drive 2 Exercise! 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I have introduced this to do look many people who have returned to me with a HUGE sincere thanks. No after taste and is great 15-30 minutes BEFORE exercising. It literally gives you the drive to exercise. Two thumbs up! 👍👍🤗
customer_reviews.author: Lety

customer_reviews.title: Best b-12 I've ever taken!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best B-12 supplement I've ever taken (and I've taken a lot). The taste is good and you can either swallow it or let it dissolve in your mouth. I use it for brain health as this particular supplement seems to help my brain fog. I know some people take B-12 for an energy boost but I've never noticed that with this product. So if your looking for a good but inexpensive b-12 supplement then you cant go wrong with this one. The only con I see with this (not for me) is that it can take a little time for the tablets to dissolve.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bran

customer_reviews.title: Helped reduce brain fogginess
customer_reviews.text: The shipping took a few days longer than expected. I like this product. I was looking for something to reduce brain fogginess. It worked for me. I noticed an improvement after taking them about 2 weeks. I chew one or 2 a day.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with diabetes or liver issues. Excellent Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I read the 5 star reviews and decided to give these Jarrow Formulas Methyl B-12 a chance, since I am currently on a drug called Metformin, for Type 2 diabetes. Metformin can cause a serious B-12 deficiency and your doctor probably won't even think to look for it after they do their typical blood analysis. This methylcobalamin form of B-12 can bypass the liver and absorb in to your bloodstream much better. The other form of B-12 is mostly wasted and gets passed right through the urine. The flavor is great and they are easy to keep in the mouth for a minute or two, then chew. I am definitely buying more. A+++
customer_reviews.author: MightyDragon

customer_reviews.title: I'm having good success with it
customer_reviews.text: This is the B12 that Dr. Micheal Klaper recommends. I'm having good success with it. I yake it twice a week and I'm seeing nice improvement in my sleep and digestion. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Love Jarrow
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is it says what your body don't need it will flush out but the doctor said that is too strong a dose said you only need the 500 micrograms, so I cut them in fours and take it that way until they are gone. He said that was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Best B12
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually notice how vitamins and supplements affect me, but I have noticeably more energy when I take this B12.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Helped me with my B12 deficiency as a vegan. Took one pill daily and a few weeks later got blood tested and my deficiency was gone. I also feel like it helped me to focus more and do well during my midterms. I felt more energetic. This product is a really good one for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Beloto

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the xylitol
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that this has xylitol as first ingredient in it as I don’t keep it in my house since I have dogs plus i have terrible stomach issues when I consume it...
customer_reviews.author: Teresa white

customer_reviews.title: Pow
customer_reviews.text: Great for energy. Works well. So well I had to back off a bit. Used the whole bottle. That’s rare for me and a supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Toni

customer_reviews.title: I like the cherry tastes of these tablets
customer_reviews.text: I like the cherry tastes of these tablets. They chew up easily and go down easily. If you are looking for B-12 in a high dose these are for you. I had low levels of B12 and took these. on my next test my doctor told me what ever I am doing to cut back because my levels were now way above. Good product, gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a difference between this and the Cyanocobalamin B-12. I am absorbing this much better - it does not keep me up at night, turn my urine bright yellow or cause stomach discomfort the way the other from of B-12 does. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: brookerains

customer_reviews.title: Great price great product plus just can't purchase anywhere!!!
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this B12 is the low-dosage of 1000 mcg instead of 5000 mcg. I take one three times a day, after each meal. for a total of 3000 mcg. Spread it out evenly. plus I support (Methyl B12) over the other two types of B12s. I'm 75 years old male, I'll leave it there. Wishing good health to all and a blessing from God.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Life adjusted
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer for my husband. I bought it for me but I cannot do xylitol but no reason to waste! Tastes like a sweet tart! Now my husband never misses. It has been a true blessing to his work day and readjustment to his morning grumpiness. Thankful is an understatement!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: I have poor eye sight
customer_reviews.text: I have poor eye sight. I have notice if I take this , I am able to see to write my checks out. I am able to see somewhat better.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 1000 mcg version of this product. The results were terrible. I was very much on edge, panicked, and felt like I wanted to jump out of my skin. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: D. E.

customer_reviews.title: Be Cautious
customer_reviews.text: I started to notice that my feet were hurting really, really badly around the same time that I began taking this supplement. I thought nothing of it as I have taken other brands of B12 in the past being vegan/vegetarian. I stopped all supplements I was on and found that it was this product that was causing horrible pain in my joints, especially in my feet. Of course, this is just my personal experience, but know that it is possible.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Clean energy!
customer_reviews.text: I had a severe fatigue issue after trying a low dose birth control pill for only one month. Even 2 months after getting off the BC my fatigue was awful. I did some research and found the birth control can reduce your vitamin b levels. This methylation formula is excellent and kicks in within 20 minutes. My fatigue is gone and no more yawning fits at 3pm. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Petefish Petefish

customer_reviews.title: Good.. (For me anyway)..
customer_reviews.text: I want to avoid the need for B-12 injections.. Soo in my mind the daily sublingual addition with this pleasant tasting supplement is a good alternative/ option.. (Providing you're keeping your gut in the best shape you can).. Life is hard (genetically) for a large part of the population.. But I feel strongly: a natural approach avoiding pharmaceutical options os best.. This IS methyl!. (avoid Cyano B-12!)...
customer_reviews.author: Sir Vertual

customer_reviews.title: Used item?
customer_reviews.text: I received this item today and when I opened the bottle, the inside seal was previously torn off...someone definitely tampered/returned this bottle! There were 53 tablets in a 60-ct bottle...
customer_reviews.author: Sherri B

customer_reviews.title: My sense of tasting food came back!
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to taste foods for months. And hot (spicy) foods were painful to eat, as well as very cold foods. No doctor knew (or cared) what to do for me. I was researching vitamin deficiencies one evening, and ran into the Jarrow B-12's. Read that a deficiency in B-12 could mess with tasting food. So, I gave the B-12's a try. In only a few weeks, taking 3 a day, my sense of taste returned, and pain when eating hot, spicy and cold foods subsided. I now take Jarrow regularly.
customer_reviews.author: JESandtveit

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I heard that by taking B-12 that it would help with my energy level. I can't say that my energy level increased where I was running a 5K but, I am feeling better than I did before I was taking these. With it raining, here in the south so much this winter season, I don't feel as drab as I usually would with being cooped in the house for days on end. Is it actually the B-12 that's helping? I can't prove that it isn't since I seem to be doing a lot more running around and out visiting people during the week.
customer_reviews.author: D.Berdanis

customer_reviews.title: Pros: reduces fatigue and boost energy. Cons: Severe acne breakout
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both took these lorenges once daiy for more than 2-3 months. It did improve our overall energy level and we didn't feel so much fatigue. But then both of us had severe case of acne breakout. At first i couldn't understand what was cause acne breakout for both of us, then realized the only change we made in our lives and diet was the B12 supplements. Stopped taking them few weeks ago, the breakouts have slowed down but not gone yet. Once my acne is under control, we would opt for a much smaller dose of B12. BTW, we are in 40's and not had any acne issue post teenage years.
customer_reviews.author: Amit R.

customer_reviews.title: A great morning boost
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why, but this is one of those vitamins that you really do notice working. I chew it after breakfast, after the other supplements, and I definitely feel brighter and a bit more energetic/motivated for several hours. I don't recommend ever taking this in the evening unless you are planning to be up into the wee hours. For anyone with chronic fatigue or fibromyalgia, this is one vitamin that does make a difference in that "three hour shelf life" we get.
customer_reviews.author: Bakersfield Grandma

customer_reviews.title: and give a nice boost of energy without the crash after
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a replacement for going to my doctor and getting B12 shots. They help a lot with fatigue, and give a nice boost of energy without the crash after. I have noticed that they work better when you let them slowly dissolve under your tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad  very bad
customer_reviews.text: I opened the bottle of this B 12 an have been using for a week or 2, I noticed a weird stripes on the pills, I just dumped the bottle out an from half down the pill are covered with a pink an br0wn fungus looking powder, I am really worried if this has hurt my health, I just took a picture of it, I tried to call Jarro but they dont take calls from public, I will never order this product again!!!!!!! I dont know how to add photos, I will have my daughter add it when she gets home
customer_reviews.author: lynda

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product but always find b vitamins to be too potent. Way above RDA. I understand b vitamin are water solvable and not absorbed so well as we age but not sure it is necessary to Make so potent. I split in half and sometimes quarters otherwise b12 can increase my anxiety and making thinking difficult
customer_reviews.author: MoJo3

customer_reviews.title: Cherry Flavored Nutrition
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but maybe too much of a good thing? After doing some research, we found this form of B12 vitamin met our needs - high bioavailability and methylcobalamin as the active ingredient. The lozenges take longer to dissolve than other sublingual forms of vitamins we have tried, but the cherry flavor is nice. #jarrowformulas #B12 #vitamins #supplements #willandkaraleigh Please click the >> Helpful<< box below if this review helped You! =^D
customer_reviews.author: WillandKaraLeigh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good Vit B12 supplement, my husband and I both had a deficiency due to an environmental exposure issue, we have noticed a more even and steady energy, we took another type for a few years but it seemed to stop helping, the real tired crashes were coming every day again, we switched to this because we read on a quality chart that these were in the High quality items and were produced with top grade ingredients, and we have been using them 3 days and already notice a better result than the others we have used. will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Martin

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant-tasting highly effective form of B12.
customer_reviews.text: These tablets taste great and were really effective in curing my B12 deficiency. After just three weeks, my B12 level return from fairly low to within the normal range. As advertised, these tablets seem to get fully absorbed into the system. I'm so glad I found this product and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Having got sick
customer_reviews.text: All the B12 you need, I take one a day. Give me energy, and I haven’t got sick. Even e thought people around me have been getting the flu. Will keep ordering better then any other B-12 I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: NoNo

customer_reviews.title: I made the mistake of taking one whole and within 10 minutes had what felt like the worst sinus headache (or ice cream headache)
customer_reviews.text: Beware that this is a very high dose of Methyl B-12. I think most people are going to need to cut it in half, at the very least. I made the mistake of taking one whole and within 10 minutes had what felt like the worst sinus headache (or ice cream headache) you could imagine. After that, I cut them in halves or even thirds and, at those doses, it's a perfect product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Got an old, used bottle
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this product many times, but the last time I got was an old, used bottle, which shocked me. There is a big hole on the seal, less than half the bottle, even the color of the tablets are different (please see photo). The tablets on the photo are exactly all what I got. I don't know how could the seller send out this kind of product????????
customer_reviews.author: logan123

customer_reviews.title: the good thing it is not soft-gel (no gelatin)
customer_reviews.text: both it for my wife and did work with her. I wanted to order the second one but seems they have no 1000 IU. the good thing it is not soft-gel (no gelatin). I will order more once my wife finish what she has. I recommend Jarrow products. I believe these stuff doesn't work with all bodies, so if wont work with you means doesn't work with your body.
customer_reviews.author: stormes

customer_reviews.title: Container takes on moisture
customer_reviews.text: Yuck!! I always seal my bottles but this still got moisture in and taste moldy! Not even halfway done. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product tastes great and it works as expected. I'm getting a good dose of energy throughout the day and don't feel like I'm going to crash in the day. I rarely drink caffeine, and if I do it's usually a cup of tea. This is perfect if you're trying to ween off or get off of caffeine and still want energy.
customer_reviews.author: MariaH.

customer_reviews.title: I love the way these taste- I let them absorb under ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these taste- I let them absorb under my tongue and 10-20 minutes later I get a jolt of energy! It's fantastic! As a vegan (who already had b12 issues) I appreciate the taste and I swear I can feel them helping my body.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, easy to chew, and i actually feel the difference when i take these! I was a total skeptic but with all the positive reviews and the cheap price, i didn’t have much to lose, lol. I’m so, so glad i tried this out! 10/10 recommend. You’ll feel the difference in yourself in about a week (in my opinion). Try it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessika

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous B12---highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: My B12 needed improving and I couldn't find the brand I normally use so I tried this...so happy I did!! This tastes so much better and works!! My levels have went up in just a month of use; will definatley be purchasing again! Highly recommend!! (I have absorption/stomach issues and this type of B12 is superior to the other variety)
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Product lists XYLITOL as an ingredient
customer_reviews.text: This product has XYLITOL in it, which is an artificial sweetener and a chemical compound. The problem is that one of Xylitol's known side effects is very soft stools and additionally (in my case) lower gastrointestinal issues/discomfort. If I am taking daily dietary supplements, that means I'm concerned about what I'm putting into my body. I refuse to ingest artificial sweeteners like Xylitol, Sorbitol, Sucralose, Aspartame, and Saccharin. I consider Xylitol/Sorbitol to be the worst of them due to its side effects on my poop factory (Xylitol and Sorbitol are almost identical).
customer_reviews.author: John L Grimm Jr

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend people try
customer_reviews.text: Use for daughter with Aspergers & anxiety. Isnt a magic answer to all her challenges but helps. Would recommend people try it
customer_reviews.author: Brenda H

customer_reviews.title: Bottle contained wrong lozenges / dosage
customer_reviews.text: The bottle I ordered and received states that inside I should have lemon flavored 1000mcg lozenges. What It contained though are pink lozenges that do not taste like lemon, more like cherry. So I feel that I received the wrong lozenges and therefore unsure of which dosage I received, the 500mcg or the 4000mcg, since both are listed as cherry flavored. Now, as a result, I don't know how to dose myself. And even scarier, did I receive something other than B12? Just not sure. I will not order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey Estep

customer_reviews.title: Fastest solving and cherry flavor fill the bill
customer_reviews.text: This is my third bottle of B12 sublingual.. having taken this at strength as shown any Improvement in my B12 blood test. I like the cherry flavor and it dissolves rather quickly. I can't be certain but it appears they may have changed his consistency as it is more granular than my last bottle. But, that's okay they still taste great to me and dissolve quickly. I have to take high dosage for some reason and these do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Saintemm

customer_reviews.title: I am totally pumped up!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I am totally pumped up! That's exactly how I felt after I've been taking these for a few days, even after the first day I felt more energized and focused. I had no idea as a vegan we didn't really get B12 and now that I know I feel so much energy, my future grand kids better watch out!
customer_reviews.author: Juice boi

customer_reviews.title: STRONG LEMON FLAVOR GAVE CANKER SORES
customer_reviews.text: These are probably fine if you have never had issues with canker sores but I don't want to put things in my stomach that are causing canker sores in the mouth as that is a form of ulcer. Just very strong lemon/citrus flavor when it should just be super subtle as this is a vitamin not candy. I'm sure the B12 form is fine and for some this is a good value but I personally would go for something with no flavor or a very mild flavor.
customer_reviews.author: austinandroid

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for years and love it. At our age we need all the help we can get as our bodies quit producing so many of the necessary vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kubala

customer_reviews.title: Taste is great and pills are powerful
customer_reviews.text: WOW, I never had so much energy than since Ive been chewing those. Amazing! And taste super well.
customer_reviews.author: Marv

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before getting the "right" product. For me the right product was something that had a natural composition, affordable and worked (based on the reviews). After I started taking this, I could immediate feel my body and brain getting a boost. Will be ordering a second batch and potentially ordering more vitamins from this brand. *To anyone shopping for vitamins. I highly recommend getting natural/organic based vitamins versus synthetic vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Samad Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I reccomend this to friends and family. It taste great and it easy to digest. I could tell a difference within a week at a small dose. They do say take smaller and build up or else you get kinda like aniexty. So I started wint 1 and built it to 3,000 a day.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: TOO HARD TO CHEW.
customer_reviews.text: have used these for quite some time, they work great. but the last 2 orders I received, the tablets are really hard. making it difficult to dissolve. how can we fix this????
customer_reviews.author: Schindler

customer_reviews.title: It just works...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several different B-12 supplements over the years, but I can honestly say that this formula seems to have given me the energy boost the others didn’t. I’m totally sold on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Xylitol - yuck
customer_reviews.text: I've taken Methyl B12 for years. First time for Jarrow. The taste is horrible (lemon) and I can't use them because I have an intolerance to sugar alcohols (as many ppl do but don't realize it). I'm shocked Jarrow would use Xylitol. If you do some digging you will find all the ingredients but they don't make it easy.
customer_reviews.author: junereview

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent everyone needs this
customer_reviews.text: I do highly recommend B12 I take 2 that's what I need for me as 2/ 500 I take that along with vitamin D3 put them together while for me it really really made a difference for me I love the feeling I don't leave you tired makes you feel like you can have a little bit better life excellent service excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Sprinkles

customer_reviews.title: Chewable tablets
customer_reviews.text: These are chewable, but I thought I would chip a tooth since it was hard as a rock biting into lol. I cannot provide feedback to it's efficacy as of yet, but hope it replenishes what my body is in need of. The taste is completely fine.
customer_reviews.author: KazC

customer_reviews.title: I take these every morning
customer_reviews.text: I let the lozenges slowly dissolve under my tongue, which usually happens after only a few minutes. They taste good. I bought the 1,000 mcg and am happy with the dosage. I've tried the 500 mcg and I didn't feel my mood improve as much with those. Although the research says it's fine, I'm not comfortable taking the higher mcg options that Jarrow has available, but that's just my personal preference, and the 1,000 is great for me. B12 is critical for improved mood and the B vitamins play a key role in preventing aging. They are especially necessary if you on a vegetarian or vegan diet, which I tend to be.
customer_reviews.author: Gianvito

customer_reviews.title: Great vegan/vegetarian supplement!
customer_reviews.text: After getting bloodwork back and having very low B-12...I sought out a supplement. I picked these for the mg amount. You can also easily cut in half if it is too high of a dose for your needs. Nice flavor and dissolves easily under the tongue. I felt much more clear-headed, focused, alert, and awake on days when I took these tablets, vs days that I didn't. Also helped with cravings. I felt more "full" and less likely to snack on days when I took the supplement. It was an amazing feeling to feel mentally alert and able to focus without feeling the slightest bit light-headed! Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Jarrow (Methyl B12)
customer_reviews.text: Is a form of vitamin B12. It can be used to treat certain conditions such as neuropathy, ALS, and treats certain types of anemia... Also Supports Brain Cells..... If you need more energy take it ever day. Works for ME
customer_reviews.author: Alberto C.

customer_reviews.title: Chewable, not Disolveable
customer_reviews.text: Another reviewer mentioned that some batches of the tablets disolved easily and some were hard. I must have gotten a batch of the hard ones. I have to chew these tablets. Even if I crunch them and put the pieces under my tongue, they are still not dissolved after several minutes. They do seem to help with fatigue, but I'd consider them to be chewable and not disolveable.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Tastes really good
customer_reviews.text: I got my blood tested and my B12 is high... it used to be really low. I am not sure my body (Ihave MTHFR issues) absorbs B vitamins well but this is absolutely helping me. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product that will do the job & tastes good
customer_reviews.text: I found it that I had become Anemic because of age and Medication with aspirin. My Doctor told me that I needed Iron & B12. This tastes good & could be swallowed easily but also can be chewed. Over time my Hemoglobins have risen to normal & my health & energy has returned. Excellent Product that works & has a good taste when chewed.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Connell

product_meta.title: Jarrow Formulas Methylcobalamin (Methyl B12), Supports Brain Cells, 5000 mcg, 60 Lozenges
product_meta.description: Style:5000 MCG, 60 LOZENGES, CHERRY FLAVORMethylcobalamin (Methyl B-12) is better absorbed and retained than other forms of B12 (e.g., cyanocobalamin).* Methyl B-12 supports nerve tissue and brain cells, promotes better sleep and converts (via methylation) homocysteine, an oxidizing metabolite, back into the amino acid methionine.* Also, vegetarians/vegans often require B12 supplementation.*
feature_bullets: The Most Bioavailable Form of Vitamin B-12 That Helps Maintain Brain-Health, Vitality, Levels of Restful Sleep, and an Enhanced Mood*
Supports Brain Cells* and Nerve Tissue*

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
